actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide for direct loans at the rate of 4 percent per annum to small business concerns adversely affected by the energy crisis.

summary.text: Empowers the Small Business Administration to make direct loans at an interest rate of not to exceed 4 percent as the Administration may determine to be necessary or appropriate to assist any small business concern (including any agribusiness) adversely affected by the energy crisis.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide for direct loans at the rate of 4 percent per annum to small business concerns adversely affected by the energy crisis.
